title: What are the childhood memories of your school? - Quora

response.answer_text: I would love to list few of my school memories..1. Calculating other classmates exam marks to know our rank, before getting rank sheet.2. Counting the number of additional sheets our friend gets in an exam hall.3.Dripping ink on the desk so that other person can absorb it and manage till sometimes.4. Knowing our best friend by whom they announce in classroom to take with them to distribute chocolates to other classes.5. Counting the number of students in a row so that to calculate which paragraph we have to read out in class.
